name: Trials Of Dice And Decks
description:
Trails of Dice And Decks is a RPG board game, where your objective is to complete a randomly generated quest! Move your figurine by rolling your movement dice, face trails, use cards and become a hero!

Your Deck is at the same time your health, if the deck runs out, you lose! However, you will need to draw cards in order to lay claim to items, weapons and more! Keep an eye on your deck and keep the balance!
